hotels.title: Hotel Petra Mare
hotels.description_general: Located in the south of the island, in the town of Ierapetra, right next to the beach with free service, which you can go to straight from the hotel swimming pool. Regularly renovated, it has exceptionally friendly service and spacious rooms. It owes its positive opinions primarily to the well-prepared facilities for children: a playground, mini-club or a swimming pool with slides and a pirate ship is just the beginning of a holiday adventure, because well-prepared animations await everyone! We recommend it for an active family holiday. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 800 m from the center of IERAPETRA with shops, bars and restaurants, by a local road, approx. 100 km from the airport in Heraklion, approx. 60 km from the airport in Sitia, approx. 240 km from the airport in Chania, bus stop in front of the hotel (approx. 6.5 EUR / Sitia).

hotels.title: Hotel Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
hotels.description_general: Excellent standard and a typical holiday club formula, nice atmosphere, the ocean and the beach at your fingertips - this is, as always, an excellent offer by the Barceló hotel chain. A great location in a pleasant, quiet village, the hallmark of which is the 18th-century defensive tower of El Castillo, commemorated in the name of the hotel. Guests have at their disposal 3 swimming pools, several restaurants and bars, and numerous sports and recreational facilities.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 200 m from the center of the tourist town of CALETA DE FUSTE with shops, bars and restaurants, right by the ocean, by the seaside boardwalk, approx. 13 km from the island's capital, Puerto del Rosario, approx. 9 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 450 m from the hotel.

Room: • room adapted to the needs of people with disabilities (on request) Bathroom: • shower: paddling pool, handrail, shower chair • handrails by the toilet

hotels.title: Hotel Gorgonia Beach Resort
hotels.description_general: Located in the vicinity of the Wadi el Gemal National Park, surrounded by a nurtured, green garden, it invites you to a romantic holiday for two. There are many attractions on site: several swimming pools, tennis courts, a gym and professional animations, and a wide selection of restaurants and bars. The hotel has a private beach with a coral reef, an ideal place for diving enthusiasts. The popular all inclusive formula and spacious and functionally equipped rooms will ensure a comfortable stay.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 50 km from MARSA ALAM, approx. 120 km from the airport in Marsa Alam.
hotels.description_hotel: HOTEL: five-star, built in 2008, 348 rooms, main building and 22 bungalows with rooms, 1st floor, spacious and elegant lobby, 24-hour reception, El Wadi restaurant - buffet meals, international cuisine, highchairs and menu for children available, meals vegetarian, gluten-free diet, 2 à la carte restaurants: La Vela by the beach - Mediterranean cuisine, Bizza Basta - Italian cuisine, pizza, in à la carte restaurants prior reservation required, 6 bars, including by the beach and by the pool, water pipe ( additionally payable), souvenir shops, jewelery shops, mini-market, money exchange, conference center for 200 people, garden, extra charges: wireless Internet (approx. 7 EUR / h), Internet point, room service, hairdresser, laundry, credit cards accepted: Visa, MasterCard, American Express.

hotels.title: Hotel Barceló Corralejo Bay
hotels.description_general: Great location, many attractions and the consistently good standard of services offered by the Barceló group. It is a modern hotel, modernized in 2019, intended only for adult guests. Located close to the beach and not far from the center of Corralejo, a well-known holiday resort with bars, restaurants and shops. The area is home to the famous Corralejo dunes and fine sand beaches. The hotel provides a free shuttle service to one of these beaches. On site, stylish interiors, modern rooms, a nice swimming pool, shared fun during animations and relaxation in the hotel's wellness center. In 2021, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: 500 m from the center of the resort town of CORRALEJO, approx. 30 km from the capital of the island, Puerto del Rosario, approx. 36 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 500 m from the hotel.

hotels.title: Hotel Novotel Marsa Alam
hotels.description_general: Belonging to the renowned Novotel chain, a luxury hotel offering its guests a comfortable stay in beautifully decorated rooms equipped with all amenities. The hotel has 4 swimming pools, including an indoor spa. An ideal place for all those looking for attractions and active recreation - a wide sports and recreational offer, animations during the day, and in the evenings numerous shows and performances. The hotel's beach with a professional diving center allows you to take a closer look at the underwater world. A professional spa center invites you for the afternoon relaxation, which offers many relaxing and soothing massages and treatments.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 19 km from the town of EL QUSEIR, approx. 60 km from the airport in Marsa Alam.
hotels.description_hotel: HOTEL: five-star, built in 2015, 268 rooms, main building and several buildings with rooms, 1st floor, spacious lobby, 24-hour reception, La Palme main restaurant - buffet meals, international cuisine, highchairs and menu for children available in the restaurant, à la carte restaurant - Italian cuisine (earlier reservation required), highchairs for children available in the restaurant, 3 bars: Papyrus Lounge Bar, Island swim-up, Ramla by the beach, money exchange, ATM, souvenir shop, conference center for max. 200 people, free wireless Internet in public areas, extra charges: room service, on-call doctor, childcare, laundry, amenities for os. with disabilities, credit cards accepted: Visa and MasterCard.

hotels.title: Hotel Lazuli
hotels.description_general: Located right next to the beach with a coral reef and a diving center, it is an ideal place for diving enthusiasts and active recreation. See the wonderful underwater world, catch the sun on a lounger by the pool, go crazy in the water park or take advantage of the wide range of sports and recreation available on site. After an active day, relax in the hotel's spa center and rest in elegant, spacious rooms equipped with everything you need for a comfortable holiday. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 20 km from EL QUSEIR, approx. 110 km from Marsa Alam, approx. 60 km from the airport in Marsa Alam.

hotels.title: Hotel Veronica
hotels.description_general: Intimate, with a nice, family atmosphere, located in a lush, green garden with a swimming pool, where you can relax on hot days. The archaeological park of Kato Paphos and the picturesque port with many shops and taverns are within walking distance - a great place to taste delicious Cypriot cuisine. The hotel also works well as a starting point for exploring the western part of Cyprus.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: ok. 4 km from the center of PAFOS, by a local road, the nearest shops and restaurants approx. 300 m from the hotel, approx. 1.5 km from the port and archaeological park in Kato Paphos, approx. 1.5 km from the Aphrodite water park, approx. 5 km from Pano Paphos and the ancient Royal Tombs, approx. 18 km from the airport in Paphos, approx. 145 km from the airport in Larnaca, bus stop approx. 50 m from the hotel (approx. 1.5 EUR / single ticket to Paphos, 5 EUR / day ticket within Paphos).

hotels.title: Hotel H10 Playa Esmeralda
hotels.description_general: A great choice for a holiday with a loved one or a trip with friends. Interestingly designed and fantastically located close to a sandy beach, it invites you to relax in the 'adults only' formula. Guests have at their disposal a swimming pool surrounded by palm trees with a sun terrace, from where you can admire the beautiful views of the beach and the ocean, many attractions will also be found by guests who like active holidays. For the most demanding guests, a unique Privilege concept with luxurious rooms and additional amenities to make your stay even more comfortable.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: on a low slope, approx. 1.5 km from the center of a small tourist town of COSTA CALMA with shops, bars and restaurants, approx. 1.2 km from the nearest supermarket, approx. 11 km from Oasis Wildlife Fuerteventura, approx. 66 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 1.7 km from the hotel (approx. 2 EUR / La Pared, approx. 4 EUR / Morro Jable, approx. 9 EUR / Puerto del Rosario).

hotels.title: Cap St Georges Hotel & Resort
hotels.description_general: New and luxurious, it delights with its unique design and a fantastic location - close to the beach, with a panoramic view of the Mediterranean Sea! Surrounded by lush gardens with olive trees, it impresses with its architecture and fits perfectly into the surrounding landscape. It is a real star among the hotels on the island - there are 3 swimming pools at your disposal, including a wonderful infinity pool, a paddling pool and interesting activities in the mini-club await kids. Go on a culinary journey tasting dishes in the hotel's themed restaurants, we recommend dinner on the terrace with the setting sun in the background! The hotel has a professional spa center, one of the largest on the island, which offers a range of treatments, including proprietary massages and treatments using world-famous brands.

One of the most luxurious hotels in the western part of Crete. Wonderfully located in a well-kept garden, by the beach, overlooking the rocky Cape Spada, from which it takes its name. It is not far from here to the picturesque Kolymbari, which has kept its authentic Cretan character, known for its excellent fish restaurants. We recommend it to the most demanding customers who will find everything they need for complete relaxation - both for body and spirit. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

Appreciated by guests for the relaxed atmosphere, varied cuisine and fantastic, extremely helpful staff - you can relax here and recharge your batteries for another year, while having a great time. The animation program for people of all ages will provide entertainment, active people will enjoy the tennis court and the offer of water sports on the beach, and those thirsty for blissful laziness, we recommend relaxing with a massage at the spa. Complementing your carefree holiday is the popular all inclusive formula and comfortable accommodation - what more could you want?

hotels.title: Amphora Hotel & Suites
hotels.description_general: We invite you to a wonderful holiday on the island of love in a stylish and comfortable hotel, located close to an interesting area. Guests can relax here in spacious and well-equipped rooms with an amazing view of the sea, or spend a nice time by the pool, sipping a cold cocktail on a sun lounger. The advantages of this place are a large, green space, which is a real oasis of peace and relaxation, and the hotel restaurant with delicious international cuisine that will satisfy even the greatest gourmets. Admire the blue of the sea, catch the sun's rays on the beach or stroll through the charming streets of the historic city of Paphos - remember this holiday for a long time!

Built in a traditional style, it is a great choice for a holiday in a relaxed atmosphere with nature in the background. The offer includes standard, superior and suite rooms, ideal for 4 people. family. The strong point of the hotel is the kitchen, which also serves local delicacies, seasoned with herbs and spices from organic farming. It is close from here to 2 beautiful beaches, including Voulisma beach - called the Golden Beach, one of the most beautiful on the island, which can be reached on foot or by the free hotel bus.

There are 2 large swimming pools at the disposal of guests looking for relaxation, by which you can relax on a sunbed or in the swim-up bar, and a professional SPA center is a perfect place to relax for the body and soul. There are as many as 5 restaurants waiting for gourmets, in the evening you can have a drink in one of the 5 bars, and during a sunny day, it is worth spending time on a sandy beach with a fantastic coral reef, which is located right next to the hotel!

hotels.title: Hotel Harmony Bay
hotels.description_general: A modern and pleasantly decorated hotel with a beautiful view of the Mediterranean Sea. Located just a few steps from the beach and close to the center of Limassol with the largest water park on the island. It is also worth visiting the archaeological museum and the museum of Cypriot wine, and children will surely enjoy a trip to the zoo. After a day of activities, you can relax by the pool or enjoy a drink at the bar while admiring the magnificent view. For those who care about the comfort of rest, there are well-kept and cozy standard rooms or spacious, comfortably furnished family rooms to choose from. Definitely recommended for a family holiday - many attractions for adults and children will ensure a good time all day long.

Next to terrifically maintained swimming pools there are cosy bars, an ideal spot for lazily sipping a drink. The very nice, classically elegant studios are very well furnished. Only a few kilometers away is the gorgeous Chania, entertaining Platanias and pleasant Agia Marina.

hotels.title: Hotel Mistral Mare
hotels.description_general: Wonderfully situated on a hillside, with a fabulous view of the Mirabello bay and the turquoise sea! Completely renovated in 2020, it delights with stylish interiors and elegant rooms. Life in the hotel goes on by the pools with sunbathing terraces, only a few steps away from the wonderful sandy Voulisma beach - one of the most beautiful on the island. Guests have at their disposal a restaurant with a terrace and as many as 4 bars as well as a spa center with relax in the sauna or jacuzzi. The intimate atmosphere, great service and perfect location are a harbinger of an exceptional holiday! We recommend exploring the area, in particular the romantic Agios Nikolaos with the beautiful Lake Voulismeni.

Guests have at their disposal a pleasant and large for the size of the hotel swimming pool in a well-kept garden. Cozy and clean rooms are equipped with all amenities. The hotel is situated in a quiet place near the beach and the center of the famous tourist town of Kissamos.

hotels.title: Hotel St. George Spa & Beach Resort
hotels.description_general: Intended only for adults and known for its high standard of services, it is a perfect place for a sunny Cypriot holiday. Perfectly located right next to the beach in a small bay, which can be reached through a well-kept garden. Picturesque scenery and the historic chapel of St. Jerzy, make wedding receptions often held here. From the very entrance, a two-level lobby with a glass wall and columns is impressive. You can choose from several bars and restaurants serving international as well as Mediterranean cuisine. Well-equipped sports facilities will allow you to keep fit. The modernly equipped spa center invites you to enjoy exclusive rituals from around the world.

hotels.description_general: If you are looking for a place for a holiday full of summer entertainment, and at the same time a place for a comfortable rest, then you will like it here! Completely renovated in 2023, it is located right next to the hotel beach and offers a comfortable holiday at a high standard! On site, a whole lot of attractions for adults and children - a dozen or so swimming pools, a water park with as many as 22 slides, a wide sports offer, including a water sports center, but you can also laze in the spa center or in one of the bars. For gourmets, a large selection of restaurants with various cuisines await, and for those seeking relaxation - spacious and comfortable rooms with the necessary amenities.

hotels.title: MUR Hotel Faro Jandia & Spa
hotels.description_general: Located in front of the famous Morro Jable lighthouse and close to the beautiful Matorral beach, it offers not only unique surroundings and stylish interiors, but also excellent quality of service and a high standard of service. Surrounded by a nurtured garden, it invites you to fully relax in the hotel's wellness center, rest in comfortable rooms or enjoy delicious local cuisine. Guests enjoy spending their time by the pool or more actively on the tennis court, in the gym or on the long, sandy beach with a wide range of water sports. Also praised for its excellent atmosphere and friendly and helpful service, it has gained a group of regular guests willing to return here every year for a holiday holiday.

hotels.title: Hotel Playitas Villas
hotels.description_general: Located in the beautiful bay of Cala de las Playas, right by the ocean, a unique, modern, fantastically designed complex, professionally prepared to welcome guests for whom the most important thing is to spend time actively. Sports facilities are second to none! The Olympic swimming pool, routes for runners, triathletes and cyclists, dance classes, fitness and yoga are just some of the numerous proposals. Kids Sports Academy for the youngest. You will not find such a great atmosphere anywhere! For golf lovers, a private 18-hole course designed by a Scot - John Chilver-Steiner. Beautiful grounds, swimming pools and comfortable, modernly arranged rooms will meet the expectations of even the most demanding guests.

hotels.title: Hotel Giannoulis Grand Bay Beach Resort
hotels.description_general: Located in an exceptionally quiet and picturesque place, among hills, right next to the beach. Valued for its high standard of services, spacious, comfortable rooms and an intimate atmosphere. Interestingly designed swimming pools are nicely integrated into the modern architecture of the hotel. The beautiful fishing town of Kolymbari, with a typical Cretan atmosphere, famous for its excellent fish restaurants and the 400-year-old monastery of Gonias, adds charm to the holiday. A great starting point for the most attractive places of western and southern Crete. The hotel is intended only for guests over 16 years of age. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 300 m from the center of the quiet town of KOLYMBARI, shops and taverns nearby, approx. 15 km from Platanias, approx. 25 km from Chania, approx. 40 km from the airport in Chania, approx. 150 km from the airport in Heraklion, bus stop right in front of the hotel (approx. 3.5 EUR / Chania).

hotels.description_general: A fantastic place for a sunny family holiday. Great atmosphere, lots of fun together, sports activities and entertainment programs for parents and children. The youngest tourists can enjoy attractions in clubs, dances in mini-disco, playgrounds and even a special menu. Everything is professionally organized, because the hotel belongs to the Louis Hotels chain, a specialist in a successful holiday. Guests appreciate the tasty and varied meals, a great team of animators and helpful staff. The undoubted attraction of the hotel is the water park with slides.

hotels.title: Hotel Bahia Calma Beach
hotels.description_general: Holiday atmosphere and great fun guaranteed! Located in a beautiful palm tree garden, it invites you to a family holiday in comfortable conditions. The well-kept rooms are practically furnished and equipped with all necessary amenities, and the fancy swimming pool surrounded by a sun terrace is the perfect place to relax in the Canarian sunshine. It is close to the center with many shops and restaurants and the famous sandy beach of Costa Calma.

hotels.title: Hotel Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level - Adults Only
hotels.description_general: Modern, exclusive and adult-only, it is part of the Barceló Fuerteventura Beach Resort complex and is the perfect choice for a holiday for couples or groups of friends. Belonging to the prestigious Barceló chain, which guarantees the highest level of service, offers modern suites consisting of a living room and a bedroom, the hotel guests have at their disposal an atmospheric sun terrace with a bar and a swimming pool and the Terra Sana restaurant, and can also use designated parts of the wide infrastructure recreation and sports facilities of the entire complex, including a fantastic spa and thalassotherapy center. It is also worth choosing the all inclusive formula, which also gives you access to numerous bars and restaurants and will make your time spent in hot Fuerteventura even more varied!

hotels.title: Hotel Sirens Beach
hotels.description_general: Located right next to a beautiful, sandy beach, not far from the bustling resort - Malia, it is an excellent choice for an active holiday with the family. There are 2 swimming pools in the green garden, you can spend your free time playing tennis or mini golf here, mini-club activities and entertaining animations have been prepared for the kids. There are 2 restaurants and as many as 6 bars where you can enjoy tasty coffee or a colorful drink. Situated between the cosmopolitan Heraklion and the picturesque town of Agios Nikolaos, it is also an excellent starting point for exploring the most beautiful parts of the island. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Sentido Amounda Bay
hotels.description_general: Elegant, recently renovated, it guarantees a comfortable stay in a pleasant atmosphere. Modern, spacious interiors as well as stylishly designed and comfortably furnished rooms are the advantages of the hotel. In addition, a well-maintained swimming pool and a sandy beach with a separate section only for hotel guests. Shops and bars are within walking distance. It is also close from here to the island's capital, Heraklion, with its many monuments and attractions.

hotels.title: Hotel Aquila Rithymna Beach
hotels.description_general: Sunny Greek holidays with lots of attractions! The hotel is located directly on a long beach, its extensive grounds resemble a Greek village: there is a small church, an oil press, fountains and paths. All this in a beautiful green garden with palm trees and fantastic pools. The largest, with seawater, has romantic bridges and an island. There is also a freshwater pool right on the beach and a paddling pool for children. The youngest tourists are especially taken care of here: great mini-clubs with activities appropriate to the age group, and Tasty Corner with a special children's menu is fun for kids and joy for parents. Excellent sports facilities will allow you to take care of the holiday form of the whole family.

hotels.title: Hotel R2 Romantic Fantasia Dreams & Suites
hotels.description_general: The R2 Romantic Fantasia Dreams & Suites complex is located right behind the Design R2 Bahia Playa hotel and offers modern standard rooms as well as comfortable suites consisting of a living room and a bedroom. Guests use all parts of the infrastructure of the Design R2 Bahia Playa hotel and also have at their disposal an additional swimming pool situated in a beautiful garden, a sun terrace, several jacuzzis and a bar. The exclusive spa center 'Las Termas des Tarajalejo' overlooking the ocean will allow you to take advantage of many treatments in a beautiful environment. An offer for anyone who appreciates originality and luxury at its best. Perfect for an unforgettable holiday for two, also recommended for singles.

hotels.title: Hotel Solimar Aquamarine
hotels.description_general: An ideal place for a family and active holiday! Liked primarily for its comfortable rooms, guaranteeing complete privacy, it is attractively located in a large, beautifully maintained, green garden, only a few steps from the long beach and a few minutes from the bustling resort of Platanias. The hosts of the hotel, knowing the tastes of Poles well, make every effort to make guests feel at home here - friendly and helpful staff as well as tasty and hearty meals as part of the all inclusive program are other advantages of the hotel. A beautiful setting for Greek holidays is the wonderful view of the turquoise sea, which can be seen from almost every corner of the hotel.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: in KONTOMARI, on a slight hill, in a quiet and picturesque area, in a beautiful garden, approx. 5 km from the center of Platanias, approx. 18 km west of Chania, approx. 40 km from the airport in Chania, approx. 150 km from the airport in Heraklion, bus stop at the hotel.

hotels.title: Arina Beach Resort
hotels.description_general: A comfortable hotel, situated in a bay by a sandy beach, in a beautiful, extensive garden with lush vegetation, palm trees and colorful flowers on the shores of a crystal clear sea. All this makes it an ideal choice for a relaxing Greek holiday for both couples and families with children. The complex consists of several buildings, all rooms are decorated in a modern style and equipped with all the amenities needed for a pleasant rest. Lovers of Greek flavors will enjoy the hotel meals prepared with fresh, local products. The well-being of guests is ensured by professional and friendly service and a cheerful team of animators.

hotels.title: Hotel Jaz Lamaya Resort
hotels.description_general: Extensive, comfortable, in the Moorish-Egyptian style, it offers an excellent standard and great service. The prettiest fancy origami made of towels in the area! Beautifully situated in a private bay, with direct access to a coral reef, where beautiful and wonderfully posing for photos specimens of sea fauna live. Winner of international awards for the quality of services and respect for the environment. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

For the youngest there is a room, a playground and a mini-club, and an attractive animation program will not allow boredom. Guests can also use an elegant SPA center with a wide range of treatments.

hotels.title: Hotel Fuerteventura Princess
hotels.description_general: The extensive hotel complex located in a charming corner of Fuerteventura offers a stay in a place known for its beautiful landscapes! Thanks to the sea of all shades of blue and the golden sandy beach of Esquinzo, a dream vacation is guaranteed! A beautiful garden, rich recreational and sports infrastructure, sensational swimming pools with free sunbeds, as well as animations for adults and children are the strengths of the hotel. The peaceful surroundings, rich all inclusive offer and spacious rooms make the hotel a perfect place for a family holiday or a romantic holiday for two. Definitely worth the money. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: on a hill, next to Playa Esquinzo, approx. 500 m from the supermarket, approx. 7 km from the center of MORRO JABLE with shops and bars, approx. 77 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 500 m from the hotel (Morro Jable / Jandia).

hotels.title: Hotel Ostria Beach Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: A beautiful place for holidays in Crete! The hotel is situated on a vast and superbly developed area, right next to a lovely beach with free umbrellas and sunbeds. The low-rise buildings are bright in colour and fit in great with the fantastic pools. The hotel's architecture and décor of the rooms is maintained in the local style, all amenities necessary for comfortable relaxation have also been thought of. Tennis courts, many sport activities, animations and wonderful cooking make for a happy holiday with the family or among friends. In 2018 the hotel was awarded ITAKA'S SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Louis Paphos Breeze
hotels.description_general: Wonderfully located right by the sea, it was designed for a comfortable holiday. Guests are enchanted by breathtaking views and modern, elegant interiors. Relax by the pools, take part in outdoor yoga sessions, play tennis and keep in shape at the gym - here you can rest the way you like. A paddling pool and games in the mini-club and during animations await the youngest guests. The spacious rooms equipped with all amenities are perfect for relaxation. The hotel's advantage is also the diverse premium all inclusive program with drinks and snacks during the day. It's the perfect place to relax and recharge your batteries for another year!

hotels.title: Hotel H10 Ocean Suites
hotels.description_general: A family hotel in a great location - close to the center and the beach, yet in a quiet part of the touristic town of Corralejo, full of shops, restaurants and bars. 2 swimming pools, including a part with slides, a gym, interesting sports animations for the whole family and a mini-club will prevent boredom, and the elegant and comfortably furnished rooms will ensure proper relaxation. Gourmets will be delighted by the restaurants serving a varied day of Mediterranean and local cuisine, as well as the 4 bars offering a wide range of drinks and beverages. The large and well-kept garden is entirely at the disposal of guests, allowing for a moment of respite in nature.

hotels.title: Hotel Stella Village Seaside
hotels.description_general: Go wild and relax on the largest Greek island! Time is spent here both calmly and actively, for example on the tennis court or in the gym. You can also lie on the nearby sandy beach, but the swimming pools and the hotel water park with numerous colorful slides are a real treat - just in time for water fun! Such attractions will surely appeal to children, as well as the animations, mini-club, playground and playroom. If we add spacious rooms and a friendly staff, praised by guests, we will get a recipe for an ideal family holiday. No boredom, lots of great entertainment - it's time for a great Greek holiday!

hotels.title: Hotel Euphoria Resort
hotels.description_general: Modern and stylish, it is a fantastic proposition for an active family holiday! A magnificent water park with slides, one of the largest pools in Crete, a wide range of sports and recreation facilities and a spa center with an indoor pool are only some of the attractions that await hotel guests. Children will enjoy the activities in the mini-club, for adults there are 2 à la carte restaurants. Comfortable and modern rooms, designed in a minimalist style, are spacious and equipped with all amenities. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.description_general: Luxurious, located on the coast of the shimmering blue sea and right next to a sandy beach, it is a real paradise for a romantic holiday for two. Each of its five stars is fully deserved - everything is the best here! Professional service, fantastic interiors and rooms, including a terrace and a private swimming pool, and excellent cuisine are a guarantee of a great holiday. Dedicated to adults, it is an excellent proposition for a quiet, romantic holiday. See how beautiful it is here!

hotels.title: R2 Buganvilla Hotel & Spa
hotels.description_general: Feel the full holiday chill in a beautiful hotel in paradise Fuerteventura! Surrounded by a well-kept palm garden, it charms with bright facades, stylish arches and columns, and a subtle design in line with the latest trends. The large swimming pool is a great place for moments of refreshment, sports enthusiasts will appreciate the well-equipped gym, the well-positioned bars offer a whole range of drinks, and the 2 restaurants have a wide selection of dishes - even the most fussy eater will find something for themselves! Children will not be bored here, thanks to the power of fun that awaits them on the playground, in a separate swimming pool, or on a nearby sandy beach, perfect for spending time with the family. After an eventful day, you can rest in bright, functionally furnished rooms with comfortable beds or go for an evening walk in the light of the setting sun.

hotels.title: Pyramos
hotels.description_general: Location - first class! Close to the center and the most important attractions of Paphos, it provides an excellent base for exploring the city. The port and the archaeological park of Kato Paphos and the ancient Tombs of the Kings are within walking distance, it is also close to the beaches, which are an integral part of a carefree holiday! There is an intimate atmosphere here - the hotel offers 21 functional rooms, so it is a great option for a quiet holiday with your loved one.

hotels.title: Hotel Creta Star
hotels.description_general: Ideally located right next to a beautiful, sandy beach, in a green palm tree garden, it is the ideal place for the enthusiasts of sunbathing. The central point of the hotel is an interestingly designed, large swimming pool with an extensive sunbathing area, from which you can enjoy a stunning view of the sea. There is also SPA centre on site where you can relax after a day full of holiday activities. Excellent as a starting point for visiting the greatest attractions of the island.

hotels.title: Hotel Sentido Reef Oasis Suakin Resort
hotels.description_general: Choose a stylish hotel located right on a sandy beach and visit the warmest region in Egypt - Marsa Alam, famous for its wonderful views and colorful coral reefs. Completely new, it impresses with elegant and modern interiors, a large garden and an excellent swimming pool complex! For guests there are 5 restaurants with varied cuisine from around the world, as well as a cafe and 9 bars, which in addition to refreshing cocktails, serve delicious snacks. Rest in spacious and functionally equipped rooms, and later use the rich sports and recreation offer.

hotels.title: Hotel Albatros Sea World Marsa Alam
hotels.description_general: A fantastic proposition for an active holiday! Modern, built in 2018, it guarantees a lot of fun and a lot of attractions for the whole family. The water park is a playground for both children and adults - slides and a dozen or so pools will not allow even a moment of boredom! Guests can also use the tennis court, gym and professional animations, as well as numerous restaurants and bars. The hotel has a sandy beach with free service and an all inclusive bar, and the beautiful coral reef makes it an ideal place for diving enthusiasts. The advantage of the hotel are modern and spacious rooms, equipped with all the amenities needed for a successful holiday. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Giannoulis Santa Marina Beach Resort
hotels.description_general: A great place for a carefree holiday, close to a beautiful beach with golden sand, with an unforgettable view of the island of Theodoroi, in the very center of the resort. Stylish and well-kept, with nice interiors, it guarantees the highest quality of services and a comfortable stay. A nice swimming pool, a well-kept garden with pine and palm trees and pleasant bars ensure complete relaxation. Guests also appreciate the hotel's cuisine with tasty and varied dishes. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Secrets Bahía Real Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: Here you will feel like in a dream! One of a kind, the most luxurious hotel on the island, one of the best in Europe - definitely for the most demanding. A real oasis of peace and comfort, surrounded by the azure ocean and blue skies. Located in the popular resort of Corralejo, right next to the sandy beach with Sugar Reef and Barefoot bars with a sensational view of the islands of Lanzarote and Lobos. The hotel guarantees the highest world standards of service. Awarded many times, it is famous for its sophisticated and excellent cuisine that will satisfy the tastes of world gourmets. The beautiful rooms are equipped with stylish furniture and tasteful accessories. The wonderful Secret SPA By Natura Bissé with its professional staff and a range of treatments is a paradise for the body and soul. Discover a true gem of the Canary Islands!

hotels.title: Hotel Navarria
hotels.description_general: Well-equipped, average standard, with a lovely fountain at the entrance. Located in the tourist district of Limassol and not far from the ancient ruins of Amathus, the second to Paphos worship place of the goddess Aphrodite in Cyprus. The hotel banquet room is sometimes rented for special events - you can be witness to a real Greek wedding! It is located close to a sandy beach, a well-maintained swimming pool, tennis court and beauty centre on site.

hotels.title: Hotel IFA Altamarena
hotels.description_general: A dream place for real sunbathers! An excellent location, just a few steps from the sandy Jandia Beach, one of the most beautiful in the Canary Islands, is the hotel's greatest asset. There are many suggestions for spending your free time on site. Guests have at their disposal 2 swimming pools, a paddling pool has been prepared for the youngest, you can also take advantage of the sports offer or relax in the shade of the palm tree garden.

hotels.title: Hotel Scaleta Beach
hotels.description_general: Surrounded by greenery, designed in harmony with nature, it is an excellent choice for all those who appreciate an intimate atmosphere and picturesque surroundings. Intended for adults, located on a hill with a stunning view of the sea, in the small town of Scaleta, at the same time close to the famous holiday resort of Rethymno, which can be reached by bus or taxi. The hotel has gained a group of loyal fans, and owes its great opinions not only to its location, but also to the excellent hotel cuisine based on the famous Cretan diet, prepared from local products. There is a swimming pool, restaurant and bar on site, as well as a terrace from which you can admire not only a beautiful view of the sea, but also stunning sunsets!

hotels.title: Alexander The Great Beach Hotel
hotels.description_general: Located right next to a sandy beach with a free service, marked with the Blue Flag certificate, close to the picturesque port and medieval fortress in Paphos, as well as numerous, atmospheric cafes, restaurants and shops. Modern, with spacious, stylish, well-equipped rooms, a large selection of restaurants with varied, tasty cuisine. Pretending to be one of the best hotels in Cyprus, tempting with luxury and modernity. During the day, animations for adults and children are organized, in the evening you can have a good time in one of the bars, listening to live music or taking part in themed evenings.

There are 2 large swimming pools, paddling pool for children, mini club, modern Barcy Water Park, several bars, restaurants and a nice wellness center with an indoor pool. Excellent holiday atmosphere, liked for good service and good cuisine as part of the all inclusive program.

Well-kept gardens, lots of suggestions for spending time, great animations and an international atmosphere guarantee a wonderful holiday. On site, comfortable deluxe and deluxe rooms with a private or shared swimming pool and spacious family rooms, as well as elegant restaurants and stylish interiors combining minimalism with marble, wood and natural stone. The hotel's spa center with an exceptionally wide range of relaxing and beautifying treatments is a great place to relax for the body and spirit. An excellent choice for guests who value service at the highest level, perfect for the organization of conferences requiring a unique setting.

On site, delicious restaurants, where the dishes will delight even the greatest gourmets, for those seeking relaxation, there is a swimming pool and spa center, and families traveling with children will appreciate the mini-club, playground and paddling pool for children. The combination of high-quality services and a charming location makes your stay an unforgettable holiday experience.

An excellent choice for people looking for a peaceful atmosphere and relaxation in stylish and modernly arranged spaces. The presented graphic material shows the visualization of the object.

The facility has a diverse offer of rooms, thanks to which everyone will find what they are looking for in terms of accommodation conditions. The hotel is good for a peaceful and family holiday, and the teeming-with-life Platanias resort is just a few kilometers away. The hotel is also a great getaway base to Chania, considered the most beautiful city on the island.

hotels.title: Hotel Hermes
hotels.description_general: Cosy, with a great holiday atmosphere, it is the perfect place for sunny, Greek holidays! Situated only footsteps from the sandy beach and close to the centre of Kissamos with shops and taverns with fantastic Greek cuisine. Practically furnished rooms await Guests, most of which have Internet access, equipped with all the amenities necessary for a wonderful holiday. On site there is a lovely swimming pool, paddling pool for children and playground. The surroundings are ideal for long walks, it is also worth renting a car and explore the nearby charming spots with traditional island buildings.

The hotel offers a stay in nicely decorated, well-kept rooms. Guests have at their disposal a nice swimming pool with a separate section for children. Located close to 2 beaches and not far from the center of Kissamos with local taverns and shops, it allows you to enjoy the sun, the sea and the lazy pace of life in the Greek town.

hotels.title: Hotel Pickalbatros Palace Port Ghalib
hotels.description_general: Soft sand beneath your feet, the sea sparkling with all shades of turquoise, an oriental style that blends in perfectly with sophisticated luxury - this is the best place for your next vacation! Ingeniously designed, it harmoniously combines landscape elements with a fancy lagoon-shaped swimming pool and a well-kept, green garden. There is a lot of space here, and the interiors delight with palace splendor and eastern details. A favorite place to relax, in addition to sunny terraces and comfortable rooms, is the bar close to the beach, where you can not only admire the views, but also enjoy delicious juices and cocktails. If you still don't have enough attractions, be sure to visit the hotel spa - professionally run and pleasantly arranged, it is the perfect place to relax and recharge your batteries.

hotels.title: Hotel Themis Beach
hotels.description_general: Immerse yourself in the unique Greek atmosphere in the famous Crete! A wonderfully located hotel, right next to a sandy beach with amazing views of the Mediterranean Sea and remote islands, invites you to an unforgettable holiday. Taste delicious local cuisine, relax in a well-equipped room and take advantage of the wide sports offer, in which you will find, among others large swimming pool, gym and tennis court. For the youngest, there is a mini-club, mini-disco, playground and numerous animations. There is no time to be bored here! The terrace with a beautiful panorama is the perfect place for relaxation, which you must visit, and the area is full of holiday entertainment. In addition to ancient monuments, beautiful beaches and numerous pubs, you can experience an amazing atmosphere and beautiful nature here. Visit the 'fourth continent' and let yourself be carried away by its magic!

hotels.title: Hotel Fergus Cactus Garden
hotels.description_general: An ideal place for both families and couples who want to enjoy a holiday away from the hustle and bustle in the beautiful surroundings of one of the most wonderful beaches in Fuerteventura - Playa del Matorral. Located in the hotel district, full of shops and restaurants, it offers a quiet, holiday atmosphere and provides a good standard of service and service. Guests enjoy using the hotel's swimming pool and rooftop sun terrace with fantastic views of the ocean, beach and lighthouse. There is also a restaurant where you can enjoy the delicacies of Canarian cuisine and 3 bars, including 1 by the pool, where you can relax on a sun lounger with a cold drink. Be sure to visit the center of the famous Morro Jable - there are plenty of holiday attractions just a short walk away!

Professional service and a friendly atmosphere guarantee that your holiday dreams will come true. Only a few kilometers from the lively and entertaining Chania, one of the most beautiful cities in Crete. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.description_general: One of the most luxurious hotels in Cyprus in the all inclusive formula. Currently part of the Kanika Hotels & Resorts chain. Decorated with elements of modern design, it has comfortable rooms, interesting architecture, five themed restaurants, several swimming pools for various purposes, professional and original animations prepared for families, but also only for adults. With the latter in mind, the entire wing of the hotel has been arranged with luxurious rooms, a swimming pool and a swim up bar.

hotels.title: Hotel Rimondi Grand Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: Spectacular views of the sea and green plantations of olive trees, quiet location and intimate atmosphere - the dream place for lovers! Low buildings modeled on traditional Cretan buildings and cooking based on fresh products from local suppliers will introduce Guests to the authentic Greek atmosphere. The focal point of the hotel is the infinity pool - ideal for relaxing during the day, in the evening a place to admire the sunsets with a glass of wine. Comfortable rooms are decorated in a minimalist style. There is also a pleasant wellness centre with an indoor pool, Jacuzzi and sauna. It is worth going to the beach, where the free hotel bus will take us, or to Rethymno with numerous shops and taverns.

hotels.title: Hotel Annabelle
hotels.description_general: Modern and stylish, located close to the beach awarded with the Blue Flag and many local bars and local attractions, it is an excellent proposition for a family holiday full of joy. Elegant interiors, spacious and comfortable rooms as well as service at the highest level mean that you will find here everything you need for a successful stay and rest. Taste local and international specialties in one of the 5 restaurants, enjoy a refreshing drink while relaxing on a sun lounger under the shade of palm trees, and relax in the pool, catching the rays of the hot sun. Do you prefer to spend your time actively? Work out in the gym, play a game of tennis or take advantage of the water sports on the beach, and enjoy a massage at the hotel's spa center when you return. The kids will have great fun in the mini-clubs at the sister hotel Almyra, it is also worth going to the nearby water park, the largest water park in the region.

hotels.title: Hotel Concorde Moreen Beach Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: The five-star hotel impresses with its elegance and beautiful interior design. Designed in a traditional style, it is situated on a large area with a nurtured garden and extensive sports and recreation facilities. A very well-kept and perfectly maintained sandy beach with free service is an ideal place for real sunbathers. The hotel is located near the Abu Dabab Bay, which makes it perfect for diving and snorkeling. Modern rooms, decorated in bright colors, are equipped with all the amenities needed for a successful holiday. An ideal place for a romantic holiday and an active holiday with friends.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: approx. 5 km from Abu Dabab Bay, approx. 25 km from MARSA ALAM, approx. 24 km from the airport in Marsa Alam.

hotels.title: Hotel R2 Pajara Beach
hotels.description_general: Liked for its holiday atmosphere, designed with panache, located in a beautiful place close to the most famous beaches of Fuerteventura. It offers excellent conditions for holidays for all those who love the sun and the ocean. The interesting architecture of the hotel, an impressive hall with panoramic lifts and a waterfall, comfortable rooms with marble bathrooms and floors are a perfect combination of aesthetics and functionality. Belonging to the R2 group, it guarantees professional service and a unique ExpeR2ience program.

hotels.title: Hotel Asimina Suites
hotels.description_general: Luxurious and comfortable, it belongs to the Cypriot hotel group Constantinou Bros Hotels. It offers accommodation in very well-equipped rooms of a high standard, some of them have private swimming pools. A spa awaits guests with an offer of oriental therapies, face and body treatments as well as relaxing and therapeutic massages. You can also relax by the hotel pools surrounded by Cypriot vegetation resembling a garden of paradise. Restaurants serve exquisite dishes, and in bars you can taste sophisticated alcohols from all over the world. The hotel is located directly on a sandy beach, in a quiet area, yet close to local shops, bars and restaurants. A few kilometers from the hotel are the ancient Royal Tombs, the port and the archaeological park - places that are really worth visiting. The hotel is for adults only.

hotels.title: Hotel Coral Beach & Resort
hotels.description_general: Superbly located, in a quiet area, close to the most beautiful beach on the west coast of Cyprus - Coral Beach. There is a private marina at the hotel and a separate section on the public beach with free service. Right next to it, in a green and nicely arranged garden, there is a lagoon-shaped swimming pool, where sports activities are organized during the day. The spacious rooms are elegantly furnished, and each has free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers many forms of spending free time, such as the Arts & Crafts center, and for families with children, The Coral Creche - a professional nursery. There is also the largest conference center in Cyprus with modern equipment. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Mastorakis Village
hotels.description_general: An excellent family atmosphere, amazing landscapes and a beautiful sandy beach - a small complex surrounded by an olive garden will be appreciated by those seeking silence away from the bustling resorts. It is close from here to Chania - called by many one of the most beautiful cities in Europe and to the bustling center of Agia Marina. A great advantage is the access to free wireless Internet on the premises of the complex. Spacious rooms with a view of the garden or the swimming pool and friendly staff complement the whole and are a guarantee of a successful holiday.

hotels.title: H10 Ocean Dunas
hotels.description_general: Located in the center of Corralejo, in the beautiful natural environment of the UNESCO reserve, with beaches with impressive dunes and crystal clear water, it is immersed in a palm tree garden and is perfect for a quiet holiday in the adults only style! Modern and elegantly furnished rooms, a year-round swimming pool and very good dishes prepared with attention to detail - these are just a few of the advantages of this place! Here you can rest comfortably and recharge your batteries with the hot Spanish sun! Part of the photo material shows the visualization of the object.

hotels.title: Hotel Civitel Creta Beach
hotels.description_general: Elegant, in beautiful natural circumstances, tempting with a peaceful atmosphere and a great view of the Mediterranean Sea, it is an ideal place for a holiday with the family. The hotel has nicely decorated standard and family rooms and 50 modern bungalows situated in a palm tree garden, a sandy beach at your fingertips and many other amenities, including a large swimming pool with sunbeds, a playground and a mini club for the youngest. There are also entertainment programs and an interesting sports offer that will not let you get bored. Choose the form of relaxation you want and enjoy an unforgettable holiday in hot Greece!

hotels.title: Hotel Summer Beach
hotels.description_general: Stylish hotel located close to the beach and the center of Georgioupolis, known for its eucalyptus trees, is the perfect place for an unforgettable Greek holiday! Distinguished by a friendly atmosphere and comfortable interiors, it is full of a carefree holiday atmosphere. Guests can use the well-kept swimming pool, perfect for a moment of refreshment and water fun, a restaurant where real Greek cuisine is served, and spacious rooms, equipped with everything needed for a stay away from worries. The sandy beach and the town center with many atmospheric restaurants and eateries and shops are within walking distance. Feel the unique atmosphere of Crete that invariably charms visitors.

hotels.title: Hotel Cynthiana Beach
hotels.description_general: Located on a picturesque peninsula in the Paphos region, which can be conveniently reached by local transport, it is a great choice for a family holiday in a casual, holiday atmosphere. You can admire a beautiful view of the sea from the hotel's swimming pool, and a small, intimate beach with free service is only a few steps away. Surrounded by greenery, away from the hustle and bustle, it ensures a comfortable stay in practically furnished rooms with free Internet access.

hotels.title: Hotel Elysium
hotels.description_general: Vast, luxurious complex in the style of a Renaissance castle. A winner of many awards and certificates, famous mostly for its elegant interiors, good service and excellent cooking, which can be tried in five themed restaurants! These are Cypriot, Far-East, Italian and international flavours, which are worth tasting with a glass of good wine. The hotel is located near the sandy beach with service and near the center of Paphos with many tourist attractions. In the hotel you can relax also on the terrace with magnificent sea-views, by a beautifully designed swimming pool in the shape of a lagoon with hydro massage or in the luxurious Opium Health Spa, which not only relaxes, but also beautifies. This is a perfect place for romantic holidays!

hotels.title: Hotel Louis Imperial Beach
hotels.description_general: Belonging to the well-known Louis Hotels group, it offers a comfortable stay and a high standard of the all inclusive program. The hotel is located by the beach, along which there is a walking path leading to the center of the town. On site, everything you need for a great holiday with your family or with friends: a lot of sports facilities, attractions for the youngest, some fun together and a great holiday atmosphere. The well-kept garden with green lawns and the swimming pool surrounded by palm trees are the perfect places for complete relaxation. Elegant reception rooms, excellent cuisine, professional service - all 4 stars with a plus!

The picturesque location on a hill overgrown with citrus groves provides an excellent opportunity to enjoy the wonderful panoramic view of the sea and the surrounding area. Comfortable, modern rooms, friendly and helpful staff and a nice garden ensure complete relaxation and a great atmosphere of Greek holidays. The new part with elegant and spacious family rooms and maisonette is a great idea for a holiday with children in comfortable conditions.

hotels.title: Hotel R2 Rio Calma
hotels.description_general: A hotel like from a fairy tale, in a colonial style, it delights with elegance and wealth. Fantastic pools, including an infinity pool overlooking the ocean, a professional spa center and the highest level of service guaranteed by the R2 chain. This place will meet the highest demands! It will seduce you with the blue of the ocean, relax with green gardens and pamper yourself with warm sun. He has been awarded many times, incl. awarded with the Trivago certification, the online travel portal, based on the reviews of hotel guests posted on the Trivago, Tripadvisor and Expedia websites, and the HolidayCheck Special Award certification awarded by the HolidayCheck website. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Aliathon Aegean
hotels.description_general: Pamper yourself under the Cypriot sun and forget your hassle in a stylish hotel located in a quieter part of Paphos. Distinguished by a wide gastronomic offer, in which you can find delicious dishes from all over the world, it will delight even the greatest gourmets and lovers of aromatic coffee. Several bars, including a swim-up bar, will make a blissful rest by the pool more pleasant, a well-equipped spa center awaits those who need complete relaxation, and spacious rooms with kitchenettes are a perfect place for priceless moments away from the hustle and bustle. It is close from here to beautiful sandy beaches, a water park, or the archaeological park in Kato Paphos, as well as restaurants and pubs full of local color.

Intended only for adults, it offers elegantly decorated rooms, 2 restaurants with Greek and Italian cuisine and a swimming pool. Water sports enthusiasts will also be satisfied, who can feel a real holiday madness as part of the external offer. The hotel is located in the center of the resort with restaurants, clubs and taverns, so entertainment is at your fingertips here! In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

There are many attractions for children on site - a swimming pool with a water park, a playground and a mini-club, as well as interesting animations led by friendly animators. Spacious and renovated rooms, 2 swimming pools with a jacuzzi and the proximity of a sandy beach - these are other advantages of the hotel. Come, relax and feel the fantastic atmosphere of this sunny place!

hotels.title: Hotel INNSiDE Fuerteventura
hotels.description_general: A new concept prepared by the renowned hotel chain Meliá. Adults only hotel, located right next to the sister hotel Meliá Fuerteventura and the beautiful beach of Barca with the adjoining Sotavento lagoon. The spacious rooms are decorated in pleasant, light colors, and the accessories inspired by the boho style give them a unique character. The beautifully arranged restaurant and the infinity pool with an unearthly view deserve attention. The location of the hotel offers many opportunities for active leisure - beach walks, cycling, water sports and sunbathing. The perfect place to recharge your battery in a beautiful environment away from civilization!

hotels.description_general: Delightfully situated on a small hill above the turquoise sea, with fabulous views to the horizon. It is not far from here to the lively center of Stalis with restaurants and bars as well as the entertainment of the neighboring Hersonissos. Warmly decorated, it has well-kept rooms, comfortable for families with children. The great atmosphere of a holiday hotel in Greek style will appeal to all who like local atmosphere and unpretentiousness. Appreciated for its service, praised for its service, recommended for its peaceful surroundings and at the same time easy access to holiday attractions.

It is close from here to the port with taverns and bars, it is also close to Paphos, entered on the UNESCO list. On site, a fantastic selection of sports attractions, 2 swimming pools and interesting animations, guaranteeing a successful holiday for active people. The hotel is known for its tasty cuisine and good standard of all inclusive offer. Modern rooms are equipped with all amenities, and the well-known chain Louis Hotels takes care of the good quality of services and carefree holidays of guests.

Functionally furnished rooms provide a comfortable stay, and the hotel restaurants offer Greek, Italian and international cuisine. An ideal proposition for a family holiday.

hotels.title: Hotel Fantazia Resort
hotels.description_general: Located in a quiet area, right next to a beautiful sandy beach, it is an ideal choice for those seeking peace, beautiful views and an intimate atmosphere, which is guaranteed by the low buildings of the hotel and a beautifully landscaped garden. Guests praise him for the quality of service, delicious food, interesting animations, but undoubtedly the greatest advantage of the hotel is its location right next to a coral reef, where you can meet sea turtles and many species of exotic fish. An ideal place for diving enthusiasts and for those who are just starting their adventure with this sport!

hotels.title: Hotel Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
hotels.description_general: Comfortable and elegant, it is the perfect place for a wonderful holiday. Families with children will surely like it: a sandy beach two steps from the hotel, a short transfer from the airport, a nice swimming pool for children with colorful toys. The superbly equipped Spa center invites adults to revitalizing and cosmetic treatments. Two 18-hole golf courses await golf enthusiasts not far from the hotel. The hotel restaurants offer an extensive menu based on selected products, not only tasty, but also beautifully served.

hotels.title: Hotel Acro Suites
hotels.description_general: Immerse yourself in luxury and admire the views of the Aegean Sea! This extraordinary place is the quintessence of modern aesthetics, relaxation and wellness in an extremely beautiful natural setting. Remarkable architecture, referring to the Mediterranean tradition, very stylish suites with infinity pools, which visually blend in with the blue of the Cretan sea, put you in the mood of Greek holidays. Dedicated only to adults, it is the perfect place to escape from the daily routine and a great choice for a luxurious holiday with a loved one.

hotels.title: Hotel Jaz Amara
hotels.description_general: Discover a gem in the famous Marsa Mubarak Bay - luxurious and modern, open only in late 2023, it still smells new! Pampered down to the smallest detail, it delights with stylish interiors and unique, comfortable rooms. There are several restaurants and bars, including one on the beach, with Mediterranean delicacies. There is no time for boredom here - several swimming pools, sports offer, animations, and for kids in the mini-club! The biggest attraction is by far the beautiful beach and the treasures for which the bay is famous - not only beautiful coral reefs, but also cows and sea turtles! After an eventful day, relaxing in the spa? Of course, find a moment just for yourself and take care of your body and spirit also during your holiday.

hotels.title: Anemi Hotel & Suites
hotels.description_general: Elegant, recently renovated in accordance with the prevailing trends, a boutique hotel with a unique atmosphere is a great idea for a holiday with the family. Superbly located, providing easy access to many attractions - only a few steps from the beautiful Alykes Beach and close to the archaeological park and port of Kato Paphos and the bustling center of Paphos. Time runs here for a lazy rest by the pool or a wonderful relaxation in the hotel's wellness center. The strengths here are the rooms - modern and comfortable, functional studios and spacious apartments. 2 interestingly arranged restaurants take care of the guests' palates, and you can drink delicious coffee in one of the 4 bars. Gather your strength at the hotel and explore the area, also plan a day for a visit to the water park - great entertainment not only for children!

hotels.title: Hotel Azia Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: A place full of romantic charm, a guarantee of the highest level of service. The hotel has been repeatedly chosen and awarded as the best hotel in the following categories: luxury, design, spa. Located in a wonderful garden with Mediterranean vegetation and nicely integrated pools, from where you can listen to the sound of the sea in the evenings. Aesthetic and elegant interiors as well as a modern style of room furnishings are the showcase of the hotel. The hotel's Asphodel Spa with a wide range of treatments ensures complete relaxation under the supervision of professionals. Beautiful location and elegant decor make the hotel a popular choice for wedding ceremonies.

hotels.title: Sofianna Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: Perfect for families, perfect for holidays for two or with friends. This modern hotel, located close to the center of Paphos, ensures not only a relaxing stay but also plenty of activities. The kids will have a great time at the swimming pool with a water playground, they will also enjoy activities in the mini-club. The hotel spa awaits adults with a sauna, jacuzzi and an offer of treatments and massages. The cozy rooms are comfortable and brightly decorated, some with direct access to the swimming pool. An excellent choice for an unforgettable holiday in Cyprus!

hotels.description_general: One of the most popular in Fuerteventura, awarded with the prestigious 'Q' quality certificate. It has a modern thalassotherapy center, using the natural therapeutic properties of the ocean and the local climate, a number of treatments have been developed that have a positive effect on the soul and body. As always in the hotels belonging to the Barceló chain, there are excellent conditions for spending an active holiday: many sports opportunities, great animations, a wide all-inclusive offer, many attractions for children, including a playground that takes the youngest guests into the world of pirates.

hotels.title: Paphiessa Hotel and Apartments
hotels.description_general: Go on an unforgettable holiday to a family hotel full of Mediterranean charm with excellent service and feel the unique atmosphere of heavenly Cyprus! Equipped with spacious apartments and studios, a restaurant, 2 well-placed bars and a swimming pool with a paddling pool for children, it is the perfect place for a carefree holiday away from worries. It is just a short walk from the atmospheric and fun-filled center of Paphos and the beautiful coast with many different beaches, perfect for sunbathing, water fun and romantic walks at sunset.

hotels.title: Hotel AluaVillage Fuerteventura
hotels.description_general: Located on a hill, close to the popular, sandy Esquinzo-Butihondo beach, it guarantees not only wonderful views of the ocean, but also great fun and complete relaxation! Completely modernized in 2019, it has everything necessary for a comfortable family holiday: a sun terrace with 2 large swimming pools, a children's pool, several bars, 2 restaurants, a spa center with an indoor pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel . Praised for the rich and varied all inclusive formula and comfortable, well-equipped rooms. The offer also includes My Favorite Club rooms, where guests can enjoy unique service and special privileges.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: on a hill, approx. 6 km from the center of MORRO JABLE with shops and bars, approx. 800 m from a supermarket, approx. 77 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 50 m from the hotel (Morro Jable / Jandia).

hotels.title: Hotel Almyra
hotels.description_general: An elegant hotel, located close to interesting attractions and a short walk from the beach awarded with the Blue Flag certificate, it is the perfect place for a sunny holiday in beautiful Cyprus! Everything you need for a comfortable holiday is located in stylish interiors, in spacious and functionally equipped rooms. On site, as many as 5 restaurants with delicious and varied cuisine and 3 bars serving refreshing drinks. Guests are happy to relax with a drink by one of the 4 swimming pools or catch the sun's rays in the garden. For sports enthusiasts, there is a gym, after which you can relax in the sauna or steam room. This is a unique place for a dream holiday on the island of love!
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: ok. 3 km from the center of PAFOS, restaurants and bars by the hotel, approx. 450 m from the shop, approx. 1 km from the port and the archaeological park of Kato Paphos, approx. 3 km from Pano Paphos and the ancient Royal Tombs, approx. 4 km from the water park Aphrodite, approx. 15 km from the airport in Paphos, approx. 135 km from the airport in Larnaca, bus stop approx. 200 m from the hotel.

hotels.title: Constantinou Bros Athena Royal Beach Hotel
hotels.description_general: Enjoy a holiday full of Cypriot sunshine in an adults-only hotel! Located right next to a sandy beach, it is an excellent proposition for all those who prefer a blissful holiday on vacation. The hotel is also a great starting point for exploring Paphos and the surrounding area - it is close to the tourist center of the city, the archaeological park of Kato Paphos, as well as Pano Paphos and the ancient Tombs of the Kings. If you prefer, you can stay on site and take advantage of the extensive sports and recreational facilities: swim in the pools, play tennis or go crazy during the animations and spend your time, the way you like it! There is also a well-equipped spa, 5 restaurants and 3 bars.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: in the hotel district, approx. 5 km from the center of PAFOS, approx. 50 m from shops, approx. 2 km from the Aphrodite water park, approx. 3 km from the port and the archaeological park in Kato Paphos, approx. 5 km from Pano Paphos and the ancient Royal Tombs, approx. 15 km from the airport in Paphos, approx. 132 km from the airport in Larnaca, bus stop right next to the hotel (single ticket: approx. 1.5 EUR / Paphos, day ticket: approx. 5 EUR / Paphos), air corridor near the hotel - planes passing by are audible but not inconvenient.

hotels.title: Hotel Giannoulis Almyra Beach
hotels.description_general: Immersed in the greenery of a beautiful garden, well-kept, it is located right next to one of the most beautiful beaches in Crete, awarded with the Blue Flag certificate. Very good Greek cuisine, clean rooms and pools offer all amenities for both relaxation and entertainment. There is a tennis court waiting for the active, and the resort of Ierapetra with local taverns and shops is within a few kilometers.

hotels.title: Hotel Iberostar Selection Fuerteventura Palace
hotels.description_general: A modern and elegant hotel in a great location! The beautiful sandy beach of Jandia is at your fingertips, and the location on a small hill guarantees unforgettable views of the ocean. The well-kept pools are surrounded by sun terraces from which you can admire the amazing panorama of the coast. The rooms are decorated in light, calm colors and are equipped with all necessary amenities, including free Wi-Fi. The offer also includes exclusive Star Prestige rooms with exceptional service and exclusive access to dedicated zones. An ideal place for enthusiasts of long walks, peaceful atmosphere and water sports.
hotels.description_location: LOCATION: in the tourist town of MORRO JABLE in the district of Jandia, by a local road, approx. 3 km from the center with shops, restaurants and bars, on a hill, at the beginning of the main boardwalk with a bicycle path, the nearest shops approx. 500 m from the hotel, approx. 80 km from the airport in Puerto del Rosario, bus stop approx. 300 m from the hotel (center of Morro Jable / Costa Calma).

hotels.title: Hotel Design R2 Bahia Playa
hotels.description_general: Comfortable, only for adults, designed in a style in line with the latest global trends. Tasteful, well-equipped rooms invite you to relax in an aesthetically refined atmosphere. The Las Termas des Tarajalejo Spa Center overlooking the ocean will allow you to take advantage of many treatments in a beautiful environment. An offer for anyone who appreciates originality and luxury at its best. Perfect for an unforgettable holiday for two in a peaceful place and in a quiet neighborhood. Also recommended for singles.

hotels.title: Hotel Lyttos Mare
hotels.description_general: A five-star standard of service, a beautiful beach right next to the hotel, modern interiors and excellent service - this is a place for an unforgettable holiday, especially recommended for families with children. There are fantastic swimming pools, lots of activities for children, and many amenities for adults, including a great spa center with a gym and an indoor pool. The kids will spend great moments here, having fun during the animations and in mini-clubs. It is also worth going with the whole family to the water park at the sister hotel Lyttos Beach. Enjoy the holiday atmosphere and spend a unique holiday in sunny Greece!

hotels.title: Hotel The King Jason
hotels.description_general: Stylish, elegant and intended only for adults - it is a bull's eye for those looking for a quiet place for a romantic holiday! A great location near the center, and at the same time in a quiet area, will appeal to everyone, regardless of the preferred form of recreation. Go for fun and spend a nice evening in the city or relax on a lounger by the pool - there are 4 to choose from, including indoor and hydromassage. You can also spend relaxing moments in the hotel's library with a book in hand and the accompaniment of crackling wood in the fireplace or soothe your senses at the spa with a personalized massage. Appreciated for modern interiors, beautifully designed rooms and professional service - here, attention to the individual needs of guests comes first!

hotels.title: Hotel Magda Club
hotels.description_general: Located in an attractive location, close to the beach and the center of the charming town of Gouves, it invites you for a family holiday in a club atmosphere. Casual atmosphere, comfortable rooms and a lot of attractions on site - these are the greatest advantages of the hotel. You can spend the day here splashing in one of the pools, there is a wide sports offer at your disposal, and entertaining animations are organized during the day and in the evenings. The youngest can spend their time in the playground or in the playroom, and interesting activities in the mini-club have been prepared for them. After an eventful day, the hotel's spa & wellness center invites you for a moment of respite. We recommend visiting the area - the island is beautiful!

hotels.title: Hotel Solimar White Pearl
hotels.description_general: Located right next to the beach with free service, it offers a peaceful holiday in a picturesque place. The complex consists of several low-rise buildings. Guests have at their disposal spacious, modern rooms. The advantage of the hotel is the swimming pool, from which you can admire the beautiful view of the sea and the mountains. It is close from here to the center of the charming fishing town of Kolymbari, famous for its excellent fish restaurants and the 400-year-old Gonias monastery. A great starting point for the most attractive places of western and southern Crete. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Creta Aquamarine
hotels.description_general: Take a break from everyday worries in an intimate hotel located in a picturesque corner of Crete, close to many local restaurants and shops, only a few steps from the beach awarded the Blue Flag. Here you will feel special, and the friendly and helpful staff will ensure the comfort of your stay. Relax by swimming in the pool or catch the hot rays on a sun lounger, try delicious Greek delicacies in the hotel restaurant and enjoy refreshing drinks at the bar. Kids can splash around in a separate area in the pool and play in the playroom, while the whole family will have a good time playing billiards, darts and table tennis. After an active day, stylish rooms equipped with all necessary amenities will ensure comfort.

hotels.title: Hotel Playitas
hotels.description_general: Located in the beautiful bay of Cala de las Playas, right by the ocean, a unique, modern, fantastically designed complex, professionally prepared to welcome guests for whom the most important thing is to spend time actively. Sports facilities are second to none! The Olympic swimming pool, routes for runners, triathletes and cyclists, dance classes, fitness and yoga are just some of the numerous proposals. Kids Sports Academy for the youngest. You will not find such a great atmosphere anywhere! For golf lovers, a private 18-hole course designed by a Scot - John Chilver-Steiner. Beautiful grounds, swimming pools and comfortable, modernly arranged rooms will meet the expectations of even the most demanding guests.

hotels.title: Hotel Venus Beach
hotels.description_general: Beautifully situated by a small bay, it offers a comfortable holiday near Paphos, famous for its monuments entered on the UNESCO list. In the vicinity of the hotel, lovers of antiquity can admire the archaeological site - the Royal Tombs. The well-kept, green lawns of the hotel garden extend all the way to the beach, it is the perfect place to relax overlooking the blue sea. The garden has a nice swimming pool, a small paddling pool for children and a seasonally heated indoor pool. Guests have at their disposal an elegant lobby with comfortable armchairs, as well as restaurants and bars.

hotels.title: Cali Resort & Spa
hotels.description_general: Visit the island of Aphrodite and choose a holiday in the new adults-only hotel belonging to the well-known and popular Louis Hotels chain - Elegant Collection. It is not far from here to the sandy beach, interesting attractions and numerous monuments. Superbly equipped rooms with large space and elegant decor have been prepared for the Guests. Sports enthusiasts will keep in shape while exercising in the fitness center, and those looking for blissful relaxation will spend a nice time in a professional spa center. There are also 2 restaurants serving world cuisine and 2 bars, including one by the pool, where guests love to relax with a refreshing drink in hand. The presented graphic material shows the visualization of the object.

hotels.title: R2 Maryvent Beach Apartment
hotels.description_general: A complex of comfortable apartments, attractively located on the seafront, right next to a beautiful, sandy beach and close to the center of the quiet tourist town of Costa Calma. The apartments have all the necessary amenities needed for a holiday trip and provide ideal conditions for relaxation for the whole family. According to the idea of 'Happy WoR2king' created by the R2 network, the facility has been equipped with high-speed internet, which will also meet the expectations of people who want to work remotely in a place other than their own apartment, preferably with a fairy-tale view of the sea!

hotels.title: Hotel Giannoulis Santa Marina Beach Pearl
hotels.description_general: A great place for a carefree holiday, close to a beautiful beach with golden sand, with an unforgettable view of the island of Theodoroi, in the very center of the resort. Stylish and well-kept, with nice interiors, it guarantees the highest quality of services and a comfortable stay. A nice swimming pool, a well-kept garden with pine and palm trees and pleasant bars ensure complete relaxation. Guests also appreciate the hotel's cuisine with tasty and varied dishes. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.

hotels.title: Hotel Semiramis Village
hotels.description_general: Located on a hill, with a beautiful panoramic view of the sea and surrounding hills, it is a pleasant place for a carefree Greek holiday. It is close to the centre of the town, where it is worth trying the local specialties at local taverns and feel the real holiday atmosphere in the lively pubs. Guests have at their disposal a large swimming pool, children's paddling pool, tennis court, terrace overlooking the sea, a restaurant and 2 bars.
