hotels.title: Elios Hill
hotels.description_general: Let yourself relax in a real five-star edition! Picturesquely situated on a hill, it delights not only with its fantastic location and beautiful views, but also with stylish interiors designed in accordance with the latest trends. Whether you are planning a romantic getaway for two or a holiday with children, you will find everything you need in this hotel. Make yourself comfortable in spacious, elegantly decorated rooms, enjoy delicious dishes served in as many as 4 restaurants or take a swim in the pool while your kids carelessly go crazy on the slides, in the mini-club or in the playground. For those who want to relax, we recommend a visit to the spa center, and for those who are active, exercise in the well-equipped gym or fitness room. The presented graphic material shows the visualization of the object.

The hotel is located on an extensive area, spacious rooms are elegant and comfortable, and the popular all inclusive formula will allow you to fully enjoy your holidays in Egypt. hotels.description_general: Sensational, wonderful, excellent - that's how it is described by guests who spent a sunny Cypriot holiday here. A great advantage is the large selection of spacious rooms, decorated in bright colors - for the most demanding guests, we recommend rooms with their own jacuzzi on the balcony and a view of the Mediterranean Sea. It is worth visiting the spa center and relaxing in the sauna or going to the sandy beach, and after blissfully relaxing on a sunbed, you can cool off in the hotel swimming pool. Thanks to the combination of professional service, tasteful decor, luxurious rooms and exquisite cuisine, guests can enjoy elegance and comfort, and the 'adults only' formula guarantees a peaceful, romantic holiday for two!

hotels.title: H10 Ocean Dreams Boutique Hotel
hotels.description_general: The hotel for adults only, located near the center of the holiday resort, is an ideal place for a comfortable holiday for those who do not want to give up the proximity of restaurants and shops, and at the same time value peace and relaxation in a truly holiday atmosphere. A large selection of animations and entertainment, including pilates, yoga or aquagym will make every guest find something for themselves. What's more, a professional thalassotherapy center is waiting for health lovers, which will allow them to rediscover the healing power of sea treasures. In the center of the hotel there is also a large swimming pool surrounded by comfortable sun loungers, where you can relax in the shade of umbrellas after a day of excitement.

hotels.title: Constantinou Bros Athena Beach Hotel
hotels.description_general: An ideal holiday proposition for families with children, couples and active people. Wonderfully located, by a sandy beach with free service, close to the center of Paphos and many tourist attractions: the archaeological park of Kato Paphos, the Aphrodite water park, Pano Paphos (old town) and the ancient Royal Tombs. It offers excellent service and high quality of service, as well as a large selection of bars and restaurants serving exquisite Mediterranean, Cypriot and Italian cuisine. There are 4 swimming pools on site (including 1 for guests over 16 years of age), slides, jacuzzi and many attractions for children, such as a paddling pool with a water playground, mini club and animations. Guests can choose from several types of comfortable rooms, incl. junior suite with private pool or spacious family rooms. The advantage of the hotel is also a well-equipped spa center with an indoor swimming pool and saunas, offering a sensational wellness program.

hotels.title: Hotel Kissos
hotels.description_general: Attractively located, close to the center of Paphos and the most interesting archaeological sites of the region, which are within a short walk. Decorated in a Mediterranean style, it consists of several buildings separated by a fancy swimming pool with bridges. In addition, the hotel has a swimming pool with a paddling pool for children, a great place to spend time actively with the family. It owes its positive opinions to good cuisine, holiday atmosphere and friendly service, thanks to which all guests feel at home here. There are shops, restaurants and bars serving local specialties in the vicinity of the hotel, as well as many other tourist attractions.

hotels.title: Hotel Dream Lagoon & Aquapark Resort
hotels.description_general: Surrounded by a palm garden with oleanders and hibiscus, situated on a vast terrain that leads to the sandy beach, it is the perfect proposal for a romantic holiday for two. On site there are 5 swimming pools, where you can relax and admire the beautiful view of the sea, for enthusiast of going to the beach - a private sandy beach with free service. The hotel offers the popular all inclusive programme and spacious and functionally equipped rooms, which will ensure a comfortable holiday.

hotels.title: Hotel Casa Mare Resort (ex. Royal Tulip Beach Resort)
hotels.description_general: The perfect place for a trip with friends and a family holiday - spacious rooms, high-standard service and animations will allow you to carelessly enjoy the sun! It has 4 swimming pools, several restaurants and bars, including a beach bar. A mini-club and a mini-aquapark have been prepared for the youngest. Located by a beach with a coral reef, it is also recommended for diving enthusiasts. The long pier makes it easier to enter the water and is a great place to watch the marine life. In 2022, the hotel received ITAKA's SAIL for the highest quality of services.
